name: kutty
description: Kutty is a tailwind plugin for building web applications. It has a set of accessible and reusable components that are commonly used in web applications.
author: praveenjuge

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "postcss ./node_modules/tailwindcss/tailwind.css -o ./docs/static/build.css --config ./docs/postcss.config.js --watch --verbose --no-map --poll" "cd docs && hugo server --disableFastRender" "rollup -w --config ./docs/rollup.config.js --context window"
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss build -o ./docs/static/build.css  --config ./docs/tailwind.config.js && rollup --compact -c --context window && cd docs && hugo --minify
